Reviews.Content: husband enjoyed stay western lots clean free breakfast pool hot tub available staff friendly helpful close duval st close near close bike rental key west recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Stevnshe
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel 5 nights february staff friendly accomodating clean pool nice continental breakfast adequate breakfast bit crowded morning recommend hotel definitely stay

HotelInfo.Name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Hibiscus Motel
